app.title: Azure OpenAI Channel Model Panel
app.subtitle: Maintain a master model list at the top, then select available models for each account/region by clicking. Automatically generate account-level and global model lists (with commas after each model name for easy copy-paste).

masterModels.title: Global Model Directory
masterModels.description: Maintain all possible models here once (separated by commas, spaces, or newlines). Models for accounts/regions below are selected by clicking, no need to re-enter.
masterModels.placeholder: e.g.: gpt-4o, gpt-4o-mini, gpt-4.1, gpt-35-turbo, o1-mini ...

coverage.regionDescription: Percentage of global directory covered by each region
coverage.modelDescription: Number of regions each model is enabled in

accounts.title: Local Azure Account Configuration
accounts.description: Add regions for each account and select available models by clicking. All configurations are stored in browser localStorage.

models.searchPlaceholder: Filter by model keyword, e.g.: gpt-4o

toast.copyFailed: Copy failed, please select text manually
